K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306a-0: @306a rgya gar skad du; pra dzny'a bha ga w'a na ma h'a r'a dz'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306a-2: bcom ldan 'das gnyis med kyi rgyal po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306a-3: de nas spyod pa bstan te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306a-4: lung aa nu yog pa rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor du bstan te; lta ba dang ni spyod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306a-5: gzungs kyi mtshan nyid 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306a-6: de bzhin dam tshig chen po'ang bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306a-7: las 'di lung gis bsgrub bya na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306a-8: mi spong ba ni dang du blang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306a-9: spyod pa dam tshig bco lnga bsrung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306a-10: shes pa lnga dang srung ba gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306a-11: stong rtsa brgyad du bsrungs pas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306a-12: rtsa brgyad stong zhes de la bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306a-13: de yang ma h'a sa ma ya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306a-14: bzhi po rdzogs na kun tu bzang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306a-15: zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306a-16: mnan zlog drug ni gcig tu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306a-17: dang la ga na'i lung bshad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306a-18: khru tshad bzhi dang ldan pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306a-19: yon tan bcu gcig dang yang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306a-20: bzhin bzang mig gi dkyus ring ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306a-21: stod smad phye la rked pa phra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306a-22: tshigs pa zlum la sor mo ring //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306a-23: yon tan 'od can bcu gcig lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306a-24: ye shes rigs can yin par bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306a-25: bcu gsum rdo rje rigs su 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306b-0: bcu drug sngags pas 'grub @306b nges pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306b-1: rin chen rigs mchog yin par bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306b-2: nyi shu gcig pa padma'i rigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306b-3: spyan ras gzigs dbang rta mchog 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306b-4: nyi shu rtsa lnga lon pas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306b-5: thogs med byang chub sems kyang 'dren //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306b-6: thams cad las kyi rigs mchog 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306b-7: sum cu rtsa gcig phan chad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306b-8: sems phebs tshun chad kun tu dge'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306b-9: yid du 'ong ba dam pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306b-10: bder gshegs rigs su 'grub par bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306b-12: de dag ma lus gang rnyed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306b-13: lus kyang khrus byas gtsang mar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306b-14: dri zhim tsandan go ban dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306b-15: dz'a ti pha la ku ru tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306b-16: ka ko la dang ga bur dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306b-17: aa ka ru dang du ru ska //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306b-18: ghi bam glang bo'i spos rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306b-19: byugs nas rgyan dang phreng ba gdags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306b-20: dar dang ras bal 'jam po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306b-21: gos rgyan chas klubs bskon nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306b-22: gser gyi rna cha gdub dkor dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306b-23: do shal dpung rgyan se mo do; ;rin chen sna tshogs rgyan du gdags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306b-24: ji bzhin bde ba'i stan dag la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306b-25: g-yon phyogs su ni gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306b-26: bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306b-27: sgrub dang sgrub chen bya ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306b-28: dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi pa; ;'phang du sor bzhi'i tshad du bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306b-29: rdo rje dri chus mandal byugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306b-30: sha chen gu gul pog gis bdug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306b-31: dkyil 'khor de la bskor te bdug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306b-32: g-yon du de byi bzhag nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306b-33: bha ga da nyid byin gyis brlab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306b-34: spyi bor aom dkar 'od ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306b-35: lce la aa dmar dam pa bsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306b-36: snying gar zla dkyil h'um mthing ga /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306b-37: lte bar sva sngon 'od ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306b-38: rkang par ha ljang 'od ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:306b-39: ba las padma'i dbyings su yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:307a-1: nyon mongs lnga rnams sbyang ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:307a-2: sdug bsngal lnga ni tshar bcang phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:307a-3: lag g-yas gzhan gyis mi thub ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:307a-4: g-yon pa ro langs chen mo ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:307a-5: de yi kha la khro gnyer ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:307a-6: ral pa gcig ma padma la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:307a-7: gsang yum lnga dang khro mo bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:307a-8: byin gyis brlabs te sngags bzlas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:307a-10: bha ga w'a na ni nyid kyi bka'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:307a-11: phyag rgya bzhi ru bdag gyur pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:307a-12: gnyis su med par mnyam sbyar nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:307a-13: lha yi bdud dang phung po'i bdud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:307a-14: nyon mongs bdud dang 'chi bdag bcom; ;phyag rgya chen po bzhi dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:307a-15: mkha' la sems phebs 'phros pa'i tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:307a-17: gnyis su med pa'i sar phyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:307a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:307a-19: sangs rgyas sems can thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:307a-20: mtshan mar btags pa thams cad kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:307a-21: bde chen nyid las gzhan ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:307a-22: bde chen nyid las gzhan pa'i chos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:307a-23: sangs rgyas nyid kyis ni mkhyen to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:307a-24: phyi nang ma lus snod bcud kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:307a-25: byang chub sems su rnam dag pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:307a-26: skye med ye shes yum gyi dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:307a-27: gnyis med bdud rtsi chen po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:307a-28: yab yum bde ba'i ngang du gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:307a-29: 'di ni snying po byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:307a-30: bdar gshegs kun gyis bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:307a-31: lus kun yongs su 'khyud pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:307a-32: rdo rje padmar ldan byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:307b-0: rang byung rnams ni bde @307b mchog sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:307b-1: phul bas myur du grub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:307b-2: aom ra ga p'u dza ho //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:307b-3: dngos grub blang zhing 'di brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:307b-4: byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:307b-5: dngos grub sgrub pa la gzung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:307b-6: bdud rtsi chen po mchog gi lung gi nang nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:307b-7: sgrub pa chen po'i lung dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:307b-10: gla na sgrub pa'i lung dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:307b-11: byang chub kyi sems kyi yon tan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-008:307b-12: aa mri ta sgrub pa'i lung ste bam po chen po gsum pa'o ////
